document_data.name: ''Ring of Mothers''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''ring of mothers''''' was a unique [[elf|elven]] [[enchanted]] [[ring]] from ancient [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: This ring was a metal band decorated with images of [[beast]]s.
document_data.Powers: The ''ring of mothers'' allowed the wearer to cast ''[[charm monster]]'' spell at will. The ring had four charges of the spell.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the ''ring of mothers'' could be found worn by soulless [[orog]]s, indoctrinated into serving a greedy [[dark naga]] who dwelt within the First Cellars of the [[Elven Catacombs]] underneath [[Castle Cormanthor]]. Along with all other treasures, the ring was scavenged from the ancient elven graves.
